trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Signature>" name="<Signature>" href=""></xref> element of an XML signature.
trans-unit.target: 代表<xref uid="langword_csharp_<Signature>" name="<Signature>" href=""> </xref> XML 簽章的項目。

trans-unit.source: The Signature class represents the <`Signature`> element of an XML signature defined by the XML digital signature specification.
trans-unit.target: 簽章類別代表`Signature`> XML 數位簽章規格所定義的 XML 簽章的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <`Signature`> element is the root element of an XML digital signature.
trans-unit.target: `Signature`> 項目是 XML 數位簽章的根項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignedInfo%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignatureValue%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.KeyInfo%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.ObjectList%2A> properties encapsulate the subelements of the <`Signature`> element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignedInfo%2A>， <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignatureValue%2A>， <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.KeyInfo%2A>，和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.ObjectList%2A>屬性將封裝的子元素`Signature`> 項目。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.ObjectList%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.KeyInfo%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignatureValue%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignedInfo%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the <`Signature`> element, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關`Signature`> 項目，請參閱 W3C 規格在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject"></xref> to the list of objects to be signed.
trans-unit.target: 新增<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject"></xref>簽署物件的清單。

trans-unit.source: The AddObject method adds a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject> object to a collection that is accessible using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.ObjectList%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 新增方法會將<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject>要存取使用的集合物件<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.ObjectList%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.ObjectList%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject"></xref> to be added to the list of objects to be signed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject"> </xref>来加入至要簽署的物件清單。

trans-unit.source: Returns the XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的 XML 表示法<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: XML 表示法<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignedInfo*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>. -or- The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignatureValue*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <>*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>. -or- The <>*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ID of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前的識別碼<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the Id property to add a string ID to the XML representation of the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> element.
trans-unit.target: 使用識別碼屬性來加入目前的 XML 表示法的字串 ID<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature>項目。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature>

trans-unit.source: The ID is used to reference the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> from another location.
trans-unit.target: 將會使用識別碼來參考<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature>從另一個位置。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature>

trans-unit.source: The ID of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 目前的識別碼<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref>的目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The KeyInfo property uses a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> object to represent the <`KeyInfo`> element of an XML digital signature.
trans-unit.target: KeyInfo 屬性使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>物件以代表`KeyInfo`> 項目 XML 數位簽章。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo>

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 XML 數位簽章的詳細資訊，請參閱 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ 在 W3C 規格。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Loads a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref> state from an XML element.
trans-unit.target: 載入<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref>狀態從 XML 項目。

trans-unit.source: The XML element from which to load the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref> state.
trans-unit.target: 要載入的 XML 項目<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref>狀態。

trans-unit.source: The value parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The value parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The value parameter does not contain a valid . -or- The value parameter does not contain a valid .
trans-unit.target: value 參數不包含有效<> *>。 -或- value 參數不包含有效<> *>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a list of objects to be signed.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要簽署的物件清單。

trans-unit.source: The ObjectList property uses a collection of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject> objects to represent the <`Object`> tag of an XML digital signature.
trans-unit.target: ObjectList 屬性會使用一組<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject>物件，以表示`Object`> 標記的 XML 數位簽章。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject>

trans-unit.source: You can also add a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject> to this collection using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.AddObject%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以加入<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject>此集合使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.AddObject%2A>方法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.AddObject%2A> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject>

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 XML 數位簽章的詳細資訊，請參閱 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ 在 W3C 規格。

trans-unit.source: A list of objects to be signed.
trans-unit.target: 要簽署的物件清單。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value of the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值的數位簽章。

trans-unit.source: The SignatureValue property uses a byte array to represent the <`SignatureValue`> element of an XML digital signature contained within.
trans-unit.target: SignatureValue 屬性使用的位元組陣列來代表`SignatureValue`> 中所包含的 XML 數位簽章的項目。

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 XML 數位簽章的詳細資訊，請參閱 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ 在 W3C 規格。

trans-unit.source: A byte array that contains the value of the digital signature.
trans-unit.target: 包含值數位簽章的位元組陣列。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo"></xref>的目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The SignedInfo property uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo> class to represent the <`SignedInfo`> element of an XML digital signature contained within.
trans-unit.target: SignedInfo 屬性使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo>類別來代表`SignedInfo`> 項目內包含的 XML 數位簽章。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo>

trans-unit.source: For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: 如需有關 XML 數位簽章的詳細資訊，請參閱 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ 在 W3C 規格。
